PyEmir Documentation¶

Welcome. This is the Documentation for PyEmir (version 0.9),

EMIR is a wide-field, near-infrared, multi-object spectrograph proposed for the Nasmyth focus of GTC. It will allow observers to obtain from tens to hundreds of intermediate resolution spectra simultaneously, in the nIR bands Z, J, H and K. A multi-slit mask unit will be used for target acquisition. EMIR is designed to address the science goals of the proposing team and of the Spanish community at large.

PyEmir user guide: PyEmir User Guide

PyEmir reference guide: PyEmir Reference
